summary: "Paradise Lost" is an epic poem written by John Milton in the 1600s. It's about the Bible story where Adam and Eve are tempted by the angel Satan and kicked out of the Garden of Eden. The first version was published in 1667 with ten books, and later, in 1674, it was revised into twelve books. This poem is Milton's most famous work and made him one of the best English poets.
title: Paradise Lost
